Posts.Content: BabyLemp1 wrote: Hi everyone ! went for my MRI & results r in :IMPRESSION small area of nodularity in the inferioir aspect of the left breast in the 6:00 position  appearing to correlate with previous imaging & suggestive of benign overall flow characteristics. While this is identified with increased signal on MRI , the flow characteristics are not hypervascular & do not demonstrate rapid washout. BIRAD 3 Follow up with surgeon . mamo had BIRAD 0 7mm ultrasound had BIRAD 4 soild mass 8mm MRI had birad 3 Fibroadenomatous type lesion or vessel on end  (age 40) Can you still have cancer even if its a Fibroadenomatous ? or is it just bengin had no biopsy yet, im confused , i have read woman who have had Fibroadenomatous & they were bengin & then had woman go for biopsy & it turnrd out to ce cancerous , can someone help me to understand what is going on , i go to the breast surgeon on the 19th , need some good advice or questions i should be asking thankyou all for being herefor me .
